title: Wait a second, where does PENTAKILL fit in the K/DA AU canon?
body:
I personally don't really care about the K/DA content, seeing that their music genre's too far removed from my own taste and the only champion I play out of their lineup's Eve, but skimming her page I found an interesting little tidbit.

That being that Eve takes inspiration from bloody KARTHUS.
Which means that PENTAKILL exists in the K/DA universe....
But that totally seems to clash with the Metal-land a la BRÜTAL LEGEND their own Skin canon is rooted in whereas K/DA cites real life cities like Hong Kong and New York.

So...
Where the bloody hell does Pentakill fit into all of this?

replies.body: There's Earth in the Pentakill universe, which is a separate planet from Runeterra where the Pentakill band operates. You can read about Earth in Pentakill Kayle's lore. Sona's song is noted to travel between these different planets.
I wonder if DJ Sona has any link, at this rate.
It doesn't necessarily mean they exist in the same universe though. K/DA universe could be a different Karthus than Pentakill one.

So pop and metal can't be in the same universe? ,-, what is real life then.
It is like 2 different genres in the same world :d

:^) are you sure? considering how close we are to getting real life animu/game cyborgs is pretty good.
I can't wait when i can get a custom order katarina cyborg, or if elon musk makes his plans to make genetically modified cat girls faster than cyborgs.

I always saw Pentakill as the iconic representative of league's music and i always will. Rise or K/DA never!

Our brothers and sister shall rise again one day! 

Correction: it's sisters now!

Karthus could be a member of a male kpop band in the K/DA universe.

Which makes me wonder who the other members are.
It seems perfectly reasonable that the 'dark metal-land' was a fiction created by Pentakill WITHIN the universe that K/DA is in.
Well Pentakill Karthus could be Heavy metal from Norway or FInland and K/DA Evelyn from Korea.
Imma just call the universe pentakill is in Riffterria
In Rune Terra  in a seperate universe
